EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_CFPlatform_Q214.Invite 5
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Foundry Summit, San Francisco - Want to go for Free?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://cfsummit.com/> Hello! This yearâ€™s Cloud Foundry Summit <http://cfsummit.com/> on June 9-11 in San Francisco is filling up fast! Register now to be a part of this year's premier event to share information, exchange ideas and influence the future direction of Open Platform-as-a-Service. We wanted to let you know how you can go to the Summit for Free. Just book 2 nights <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375> or more at the conference hotel and you'll receive one free ticket to the Summit within 24 hours of confirming your booking. Must complete by Friday! Book your room TODAY> <https://aws.passkey.com/g/24211375>> Join core contributors, fellow users and Cloud Foundry Foundation members such as IBM, HP, NTT, and ActiveState to learn and share:
- New case studies - Engineering roadmap - Technical architecture and implementation details - Operational best practices - Hack Night
Check out the agenda >> <https://2014.event.cfsummit.com/schedule>
Sponsorship opportunities <http://cfsummit.com/#sponsors> are still available for this exclusive event. We look forward to seeing you at the Summit! Team Cloud Foundry #cfsummit
